name: Den
description: You are standing in a cozy room lit by an overhead lamp with a soft red shade. A once-plump couch sits on a rug in the center of the room, leaking stuffage.

north.name: Exit 1
north.description: To the north is a doorway

west.name: Exit 1
west.description: A closed swinging door lies to the west

description.empty: A trodden couch sits in the middle of the room.
